snippet: President Obama makes his case against Mitt Romney’s tried and discredited economic policies.
abstract: Editorial warns Pres Obama that he has yet to make a succinct case for why voters should choose him over his opponent Mitt Romney, as illustrated by his overlong economic policy speech to his supporters in Cleveland; holds that Obama is running out of time to make the vital point that Romney is trying to resurrect failed Bush-era economic policies.
lead_paragraph: President Obama makes his case against Mitt Romney’s tried and discredited economic policies.
